originalText.text: Such a cute place with amazing interior decorating! They really listened and had me help pick out which flowers I wanted (and kept me in budget)! The space is really large and immersive so you can walk through all the flowers that will eventually be in your bouquet.

text.text: Such a cute place with amazing interior decorating! They really listened and had me help pick out which flowers I wanted (and kept me in budget)! The space is really large and immersive so you can walk through all the flowers that will eventually be in your bouquet.

originalText.text:
I found Le Bouquet NY through a friend and I'm so glad that I did. I reached out to the florists to hire them for our wedding and they truly went above and beyond. They were super easy to communicate with and they executed flawlessly.

During our first consultation, Sung was super attentive to what my fiance and I were envisioning for our wedding. He noted key statement florals we were looking for and confirmed our color scheme. He also asked if there were any must have flowers or any other details we wanted. We were pretty open and leaned into his suggestions. Within the week, he provided us with a clear quote and we signed! A week or so before our wedding, they confirmed details and on the day of the wedding they were very on time with set up and personal floral drop offs!

They truly out did themselves and their florals made our wedding venue perfect- brought our dreams to a reality! Cannot recommend them enough!

originalText.text:
Le Bouquet NY did an incredible job on the flowers for my wedding!

My bouquet, my husband's boutonniere, the centerpieces, the bud vases, the flowers for the cake, the decorations for the dessert table, and even the aisle petals were all perfection. All my thanks to the lovely couple who run such a beautiful business!

originalText.text: Cool hidden place in the east village. Put together a beautiful arrangement in no time. I’ll definitely be back to work in the cafe space yet they have.

originalText.text:
Wonderful florist who did my cousin's wedding flowers.  I'm not sure if they did her bouquet, but I'm certain they did the centerpieces and they were beautiful.

THis shop is super cute both inside and out.  The service was friendly and they helped my cousin out a lot with all of her questions.  Thumbs
